alert.note: Alert for Polk (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 6:23AM CDT until June 08 at 1:32AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Raccoon River at Des Moines Fleur Dr affecting Polk County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Raccoon River at Des Moines Fleur Dr. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 13.3 feet, Southwest 30th Street is closed from George Flagg Parkway to Bell Avenue. George Flagg Parkway is closed from Southwest 30th Street to Southwest 28th Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 12.0 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
